We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private TriangularMovingAverage _trima;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_trima = TRIMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_trima.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "TRIMA Current", _trima.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.trima = self.TRIMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.trima.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TRIMA Current", self.trima.Current);
